articles.title: Justin Bieber opens up on depths of his past drug use and says his guards used to check his pulse - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Canadian pop star, 27, said that he was immersed in substance abuse at a time he was not prepared for how to deal with the massive success he had as a performer.
articles.content:
Justin Bieber opened up about his past drug use, saying things got so bad, his guards used to check his pulse to make sure he was alive.
